alert.note: Alert for Fond du Lac; Sheboygan (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 2:26AM CDT until July 24 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Fond du Lac County in east central Wisconsin... Western Sheboygan County in east central Wisconsin... * Until 315 AM CDT. * At 226 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Campbellsport, or 9 miles southeast of Fond Du Lac, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fond Du Lac, Plymouth, North Fond Du Lac, Campbellsport, Elkhart Lake, Southern Lake Winnebago, Taycheedah, Byron, Greenbush, Eden, Mount Calvary, Cascade, Waldo, St. Cloud, Glenbeulah, Beechwood, Johnsonville, Waucousta, Calvary and Marytown. People attending The Fond du Lac County Fair should seek safe shelter immediately! HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
